name: mapreduce.task.userlog.limit.kb
description: The maximum size of user-logs of each task in KB. 0 disables the cap.

name: hadoop.security.uid.cache.secs
description:
This is the config controlling the validity of the entries in the cache
        containing the userId to userName and groupId to groupName used by
        NativeIO getFstat().

name: dfs.datanode.directoryscan.threads
description:
How many threads should the threadpool used to compile reports
  for volumes in parallel have.

name: ha.zookeeper.session-timeout.ms
description:
The session timeout to use when the ZKFC connects to ZooKeeper.
    Setting this value to a lower value implies that server crashes
    will be detected more quickly, but risks triggering failover too
    aggressively in the case of a transient error or network blip.

name: hadoop.zk.timeout-ms
description:
ZooKeeper session timeout in milliseconds. Session expiration
    is managed by the ZooKeeper cluster itself, not by the client. This value is
    used by the cluster to determine when the client's session expires.
    Expirations happens when the cluster does not hear from the client within
    the specified session timeout period (i.e. no heartbeat).

name: yarn.app.mapreduce.am.containerlauncher.threadpool-initial-size
description:
The initial size of thread pool to launch containers in the
    app master.

name: dfs.image.transfer.timeout
description:
Socket timeout for the HttpURLConnection instance used in the image
        transfer. This is measured in milliseconds.
        This timeout prevents client hangs if the connection is idle
        for this configured timeout, during image transfer.

name: dfs.datanode.slowpeer.low.threshold.ms
description: Threshold in milliseconds below which a DataNode is definitely not slow.
